title: NEDs Reimagined Report Published
description: The IoD Centre for Corporate Governance publishes the NEDs Reimagined report, co-authored by Professor Esser, reassessing the role of non-executive directors more than twenty years after the Higgs Review.

title: Reimagining Non-Executive Directors Event
description: Launch event for the NEDs Reimagined report at the Institute of Directors, London, bringing together directors, governance professionals, and policymakers.

title: Anthropy 2026
description: I am looking forward to joining 2,000 cross-sector leaders at #Anthropy26, where we will explore a brighter vision for Britain over the next 30 years. I am excited to play my part in inspiring a more united future for the United Kingdom. I will be there from 25-27 March at the Eden Project, Cornwall.

title: ESG Ratings Activities Regulation: A Commentary
description: Out now - The Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) Ratings Activities Regulation: A Commentary. Edited by Andrea Miglionico, Associate Professor, School of Law University of Reading, UK. Available in print and eBook through our website. Available for your law firm or institution through Elgaronline, where Chapter 1 is currently free to access.

title: New Article
description: New article on Corporate Governance and Higher Education.
